title: Simple burglar alarm
content: In this tutorial you will learn how to create a simple burglar alarm

Select **EnviromentalMotion** to detect motion with your device's camera

![simple lamp](https://github.com/bellinux/tutorial-protobject/raw/main/images/Devices/Items/EnviromentalMotion-Item.png)
this will be used to catch potential thieves

Scan the QR code with your smartphone.

![QrCode](https://github.com/bellinux/tutorial-protobject/raw/main/images/qrscan.png)

Alternatively, click on _Open in this device_ to open the rgb lamp locally.

Move the **if** ![QrCode](https://github.com/bellinux/tutorial-protobject/raw/main/images/Logic/if-component.png) and **comparison** ![comparison](https://github.com/bellinux/tutorial-protobject/raw/main/images/Logic/comparison-component.png) components to the workspace
